trans-unit.source: Provides attributes that can be used to write a custom HTTP handler for storing temporary image files.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用來撰寫自訂 HTTP 處理常式來存放暫存影像檔案的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the custom handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的處理常式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the custom handler.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示自訂處理常式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory of the custom handler where the temporary image files will be stored.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定暫存影像檔案的儲存位置之目錄的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the directory.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>代表目錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the folder which will be used for storing images in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於儲存映像指定目錄中的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the folder name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>代表資料夾名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handler type of the custom handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得自訂的處理常式的處理常式類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the custom handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的自訂處理常式。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a settings parameter with the specified name registered in the Web.config file under the `ChartHttpHandler` key.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定名稱的設定參數註冊在 Web.config 檔案中`ChartHttpHandler`索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to access any parameter in the Web.config file under the `ChartHttpHandler` key.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來存取下的 Web.config 檔案中的任何參數`ChartHttpHandler`索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Name of the parameter to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 參數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag that indicates whether the handler will utilize private images.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出此處理常式是否會使用私人映像的旗標。

trans-unit.source: When the PrivateImages property is set, the handler will not return images out of session scope.
trans-unit.target: 當 PrivateImages 屬性設定時，此處理常式不會傳回工作階段範圍的映像。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the client will not be able to download another user's images.
trans-unit.target: 此外，用戶端將無法下載另一位使用者映像。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the handler will utilize private images, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果此處理常式會使用私人映像，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the chart image storage type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表影像儲存類型。

trans-unit.source: Chart images can be stored as files or in memory.
trans-unit.target: 可以儲存圖表影像，為檔案，或在記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHttpHandlerStorageType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the chart image storage type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHttpHandlerStorageType"> </xref>列舉值，表示圖表影像儲存類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the timeout of the custom handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的處理常式逾時。

trans-unit.source: When the timeout has expired, the stored chart image is overridden by a new chart image or discarded.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值已過期，當預存的圖表影像是新的圖表影像的覆寫或已捨棄。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> enumeration value that represents the lifetime of the chart images.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>列舉值，表示圖表影像的存留期。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL that corresponds to the HTTP path where temporary image files are stored.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對應的 URL 為 HTTP 的路徑來存放暫存影像檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示 URL 的值。
